Title: Makes technical corrections regarding the public financing of elections; repealer
Summary: Makes technical corrections regarding the public financing of elections.
LawCode: Amd El L, generally; amd §§92-t & 95, St Fin L; rpld Part ZZZ §11, Chap 58 of 2020
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law and the state finance law, in relation to making technical corrections regarding the public financing of elections; and to repeal certain provisions of part ZZZ of chapter 58 of the laws of 2020 amending the state finance law relating to establishing the New York state campaign finance fund, in relation thereto
